LocaleResource.Value: Default Product Sort Option

LocaleResource.Name: ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltration
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To Element On The Page After Filtration

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the page will be scrolled to the element specified below.

LocaleResource.Name: ElementToScrollAfterFiltrationSelector
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To This Element After Filtration

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Here you can list your element selectors, divided by commas. We scroll to the first found element. Default behaviour is scroll to .product-selectors.

LocaleResource.Name: ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop Ajax Filters -> Settings
